name: DocumentLoader@7609
description: Loads and extracts text content from the specified file path, returning the content as a string. This component is used to access the content from the file saved at ./shared/content.txt.

outputs.description: The extracted text content from the document. Non-text elements are appropriately handled or ignored based on the nature of the content.
outputs.example: This is the text content of the file...

name: KnowledgeQuery@2348
description: Queries knowledge data using a natural language query to find the most relevant information. In this case, it analyzes the text content extracted from the file for key points and information.

inputs.content: Please analyze the text content and extract key information.

outputs.description: A JSON string containing the top k relevant pieces of information extracted from the text content, including their relevance scores.

name: OpenAIAgent@9823
description: A specialized language model capable of generating advanced summaries and processing text inputs. It can be optionally used for further summarization of the extracted key information.

inputs.content: You are tasked with summarizing the extracted key information for the instructor's review.
